item.description: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=R9R9jYUvgSI Ettienne Lategan This video is only 2 min long and it’s explains more that other 10-15 min long videos. Someone please hand this person an award! Thanks.

item.title: science behind activated sludge process
item.description: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=su8DkXANDe0 Biochemical oxygen demand gets biodegraded in an activated sludge system, in this video I will explain you how it works..
